description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8q48d","text":"This protocol is a bespoke modification of the FindingNemo protocol (LongRead Club) to enable ultra-long (UL) sequencing of yeast on Nanopore sequencers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":11}],"data":{}},{"key":"cd6vh","text":"We have tested and optimised this in Saccharomyces cerevisae using the obsolete SQK-ULK001 kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":37,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjs2n","text":"It's not tested yet but we think the new ULK114 can be used to replace ULK001, using exact volumes of the corresponding reagents. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"as86e","text":"Let us know if you have tried it with the new kit!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gvve","text":"Our best read N50 so far was ~67 kb (look at profile pic). This is not (yet) ultra-long, but may also be due to the distribution of chromosome sizes which is generally smaller than more complex eukaryotes, e.g. mammals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"18FF7847163D43E29FB9AED19ABB5870","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bxwrppd6"}}}}

fork_info.title: ONT Ultra-Long Multiplex Sequencing of Yeast Cells (S. cerevisiae) – A Modified FindingNemo Protocol

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ml54","text":"In a 2 ml DNA LoBind tube, pellet ~200 million cells (  volume of pellet per reaction).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"990ft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"065170E0981111EDAC65B50CC9C8176C","id":0,"label":"circa","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc7kn","text":"Wash cells in cold PBS and centrifuge at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1829c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10.000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"27FF9280981111EDAC65B50CC9C8176C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"52lk","text":"Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"120f7","text":"Repeat step 2-3 once more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo5d9","text":"Resuspend pellet in   SpheroBuffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eh9qm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"480","error":false,"guid":"F99F2DC0981411EDAC65B50CC9C8176C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f00nf","text":"Add   lyticase (5U/μl), mix well with a wide-bore pipette tip and incubate at   . The solution should clear up when protein digestion takes place.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7dm44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4D36E8A0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"52334E70981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5F8704E0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"700","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5jtk","text":"Incubate at  for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chsb3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"81F987F0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"84ABAFA0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23dg5","text":"Add   5M Ammonium acetate and   5M NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"93F876F0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"B56AC810981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g6dl","text":"Centrifuge at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5omd5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"16.000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F9E859D0981611EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nrcs","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a new 2 ml tube, careful not to transfer protein layer/precipitate at the bottom. If lysate is too thick to have layers, move as much clear lysate as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"643ps","text":"Add 3 glass beads (diameter = 3mm) to the cell lysate and   isopropanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"29dvb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ddi0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ohje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"25A40790981711EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aune","text":"If the tube cannot accommodate 500 µl isopropanol, add as much isopropanol as possible (\u003e400 ul). Then after DNA precipitation, take 200-300 µl from the upper part and replace with the same amount of isopropanol and rotate again to further precipitate DNA.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cn2g4","text":"Mix on a Hula mixer at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3nk08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7844FBD0981711EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"this can be extended to 10 minutes","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"9","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"623d","text":"Check that the DNA has bound tightly around the beads and let sit for another minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cngo","text":"Remove liquid by pipetting or carefully tipping it over while guarding the beads with the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7uake","text":"Wash bound DNA with   of 70% ethanol, rotate the tube 2-3 times then discard the wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dv6sg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"AA73F7F0981711EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"annpj","text":"Repeat wash once more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecspn","text":"Remove ethanol as much as possible, pour beads into a retainer tube on a collection column. Quickly spin (less than 1 second) on a table-top minicentrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brtb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lkon","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abgv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7266p","text":"Alternatively, instead of spinning, just absorb excess ethanol with a wipe. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6njnv","text":"Quickly pour beads to a new 2 ml tube previously aliquoted with   10mM Tris-HCl pH 9.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":66,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4f3r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qodf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j4m5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100-120","error":false,"guid":"11FB0020981911EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3cl75","text":"If handling multiple samples, do step 21-22 one sample at a time. Do not let the DNA on the beads to dry as it makes DNA elution and homogenization more difficult.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blivh","text":"Incubate at   for at least   with regular pipetting every 10-15 min using a wide-bore tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43nga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2ACA2A90981911EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"31CE2030981911EDB6037BBA3575FB6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmee6","text":"Discard the second wash buffer as much as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97sqj","text":"Quick spin the tube and use a 10 µl tip to discard the rest of the buffer at the bottom of the tube (move the beads aside with the tip while doing it). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hi2r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chcj","text":"\n\n\t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6gr6m","text":"Make sure sample is homogeneous and cold while mixing with FRA. The enzyme is fast acting and we want to make sure it difuses evenly through the DNA molecules before incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53nsc","text":"An accurate measurement of DNA concentration is important as this will determine the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n0r9","text":"optimum ratio of transposase (FRA) to DNA molecules at the library prep step. Also, the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25i2k","text":"viscous nature of UHMW DNA requires that sample measurement represents all parts of the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"714pq","text":"DNA solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmj02","text":"Two nucleic acid quantification methods, i.e., fluorometric (Qubit) and spectrophotometric","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"503ub","text":"(Nanodrop), can be used in parallel to assess both the quantity and quality of the extracted","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feuuf","text":"DNA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8b3n1","text":"For Nanodrop measurement, measure 3 positions from top, middle, and bottom part of the sample. Percent CV can then be calculated from these concentrations to gauge DNA homegeneity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80plo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mjp7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fcnme","text":"If %CV is still \u003e=100%, homogenise by more regular pipetting","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"63k6h","text":"and/or rotation at 9 rpm for few hours up to overnight as before.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

Reading should show only traces amount or \u003c100% of [DNA]. If \u003e100%, DNA concentration needs to be adjusted by this, e.g. halved.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3arsu","text":"Whenever possible, the quality of extracted DNA sample should be analysed by method(s) that","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"deho2","text":"enable visual inspection of molecule length distribution such as:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnq26","text":"Regular agarose gel electrophoresis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bpbq","text":"Pulsed-Field Gel Electrophoresis, e.g., using Pippin Pulse (Sage Science)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ajob","text":"Agilent Bioanalyzer DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er8ud","text":"Agilent TapeStation DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
